name: @freik/arduino2proj
description: Arduino platform and library to Makefile conversion tool
author: Kevin Frei <kevinfrei@hotmail.com>

scripts.release: bun rm ./lib && tools make-module -t tsconfig.opt.json --minify src/*.ts src/downloader/*.ts src/targets/*.ts
scripts.build: bun rm ./lib && tools make-module -t tsconfig.opt.json --minify src/*.ts src/downloader/*.ts src/targets/*.ts
scripts.local_release: rimraf ./lib && tools make-module --esm --minify --ts tsconfig.opt.json --platform node src/*.ts
scripts.local_build: rimraf ./lib && tools make-module --esm --minify --ts tsconfig.json --platform node src/*.ts
scripts.chk: bun run build && bun run lint && bun run test
